metadata.title: CVE-2020-1892 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient boundary checks when decoding JSON in JSON_parser allows readaccess to out of bounds memory, potentially leading to information leak andDOS. This issue affects HHVM 4.45.0, 4.44.0, 4.43.0, 4.42.0, 4.41.0,4.40.0, 4.39.0, versions between 4.33.0 and 4.38.0 (inclusive), versionsbetween 4.9.0 and 4.32.0 (inclusive), and versions prior to 4.8.7.

criterions.comment: hhvm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
